data.actual_result: You hover on and javascript not work with it. For solving need simple add to CSS rule to ".image .image-gif" selector: "pointer-events: none;" (so hover will work on canvas and you can click through it).
data.expected_result: Gif should play and responce on clicks
data.short_description: Hovering on GIF label on embeded gif in chat and clicking on it as well not make any action (play/open in browser)
data.steps_to_repro: - Post gif with small height or any other gif - Hover on GIF label (for gif with big height you need to do it fast) - You will see this bug (label not dissappear and gif not play and click not work)
